title: Huaier relieves oxaliplatin-induced hepatotoxicity through activation of the PI3K/AKT/Nrf2 signaling pathway in C57BL/6 mice
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Xinwei Cheng, Chen Zhu, Yunzhou Chen, Min Li, Guodong Li, Yue Zu, Qianyan Gao, Tianze Shang, Dong Liu, Chengliang Zhang, Xiuhua Ren
